Mobiles› Xiaomi Redmi Note 10› Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 Images

Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 Images

Check out the Xiaomi Redmi Note 10's images, UI screenshots, videos and more in this page. With pictures of the Xiaomi Redmi Note 10, you can get a better look at the phone's design along with enjoying its 360-degree view. There are screenshots as well which lets you see the Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 wallpaper that comes out of the box as well as the preloaded apps. And with the Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 camera samples, you can get an idea of its picture quality.

+ Read More
  • Design
  • Camera Samples
  • 360° View
  • Camera UI
  • UI Screenshots
  • Videos

Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 - Design

Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 Photos / Pictures

View Original Image

Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 has a 6.43" (16.33 cm) display, which means bigger screen for enjoying movies and games on the go, though might not be ergonomic or pocketable. It has a 6.43 inches (16.33 cm) resolution, which results in pixel density of 1080 x 2400 pixels and offers very high sharpness.

View Original Image

Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 has a 5000 mAh li-polymer battery, which is not user replaceable.

View Original Image

Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 has a 13 MP Front Camera front camera without front Flash. With this resolution, the smartphone is a good option for selfies.

View Original Image

Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 features a 48 + 8 + 2 + 2 MP Quad Primary Cameras with LED Flash.

View Original Image

The Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 has 2 slots (Nano), and is VoLTE enabled.

View Original Image

The Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 has a USB Type-C port for charging and data transfers. The Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 features quick charging, but doesn't support wireless charging.

View Original Image
